title: virtuelleakademie
text:
Dozenten

Dr. Andrew Ellis and Dr. Stefan Hackstein are researchers at the Virtual Academy of the Bern University of Applied Sciences. Their research focusses on how artificial intelligence can be used effectively in educational systems.
